name: Flame Out
description:
FULL SCREEN FOR BEST RESOLUTION!

You're an explorer headed into the cave. Will one glimpse of each cave room be enough for you to escape? 

Hint: time your movements with the ticks in the background.

Movement: Arrow keys + WASD

Jump: Space 

Game design, development, & background music: Salam Sibai 

Game art and animations: Tamara Abdul Khalek

Shoutout to Rama Abdul Khalek & Mohammed Eltawil for their help in coloring and cropping! :D

Follow us on instagram! @SSibai96 & @TATAIGASAMA

SFX credits to zapsplat . com
